graphicCorner.productInformation: 120 sheets notebook with hard cover made of recycled cardboard. 16x22cm
graphicCorner.description: The Mountain fox notebook is the best option to write down your most ingenious ideas. At work, at home or when traveling, its endearing design and manufacturing quality will make you feel like writing! 90 gsm paper / double spiral binding.
